{include "affiliate_loader"} Know where the candidates stand on key criminal justice issues. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}

{include "default_salutation"} –

In the May 19 primary election, Multnomah County voters will be choosing a new district attorney. This voter guide provides facts on where the candidates stand on key issues.

Prosecutors are the most influential actors in the criminal justice system, and the Multnomah County District Attorney is one of the most important criminal justice system officials in Oregon.

Know Where the Candidates Stand
on Key Civil Liberties, Civil Rights, and Criminal Justice Issues


Please remember to return your ballot by Tuesday, May 19.

Thank you,

ACLU of {affiliate_name}

This message was only sent to current ACLU members who live in Multnomah County. Thank you for your support.
